name: EOS Global Expansion
description: Eos is Asia’s leading provider of outsourced employment solutions. Under a model known as PEO ( Professional Employer Organization ), or GEO ( Global Employer Organization ), we hire your staff as employees into our own local company in your target country, so you don’t need to register your own subsidiary. We manage all of the payroll, tax, and HR functions that require expert local knowledge. Your team then oversee the employees day to day activities as usual – You can focus on your business objectives and leave the rest to us.
Headline: Navigating the complexities of global expansion is our expertise.
ShortDescription: Hire staff quickly & compliantly, without the cost, delays, or resource drain of setting up a foreign subsidiary

Highlights.name: Visa Sponsorship and Immigration Services
Highlights.description: We guide you through the intricate visa application process and ensure your employees have the permits to work legally in their respective countries.

Highlights.name: Payroll, Benefits, and Expenses
Highlights.description: We handle all payroll calculations, benefits administration, and expense reimbursement, ensuring compliance with local tax and labor laws.

Highlights.name: Tax Management and Leave Administration
Highlights.description: We manage tax registrations, tax filings, and leave accruals, relieving you of the administrative burden.

enhanced_description: EOS Global Expansion is Asia's leading provider of outsourced employment solutions, operating under a PEO (Professional Employer Organization) or GEO (Global Employer Organization) model. This service enables companies to hire staff in target countries without needing to establish a local subsidiary, as EOS employs the staff within its local entities. EOS manages comprehensive HR functions, including payroll calculations, benefits administration, expense reimbursement, tax registrations and filings, and leave accruals, ensuring compliance with local tax and labor laws. Additionally, the service provides expert support for visa sponsorship, immigration services, and company incorporation. It also offers recruitment and talent acquisition services. This allows client companies to hire staff quickly and compliantly, focusing on their business objectives while EOS handles the complexities of global employment.
key_use_cases: Global workforce expansion without establishing legal entities.
Ensuring compliance with local labor and tax laws in foreign countries.
Streamlining international payroll and benefits administration.
Facilitating global talent acquisition and recruitment.
Managing international visa and immigration processes for employees.
Reducing the administrative burden and costs associated with international hiring.
competitive_advantages: Elimination of the need for clients to register foreign subsidiaries.
Expertise in local payroll, tax, HR, and immigration compliance.
Enabling rapid and compliant global hiring.
Reducing cost, delays, and resource drain associated with global expansion.
Allowing clients to focus on core business objectives.
implementation_scenarios: Companies expanding into new countries, particularly in Asia, seeking to hire employees quickly and compliantly without establishing a local legal entity.
roi_benefits: Reduced costs associated with international subsidiary setup.
Accelerated time to market for global expansion initiatives.
Mitigation of compliance risks related to international employment laws and taxes.
Optimization of internal resources by outsourcing complex HR operations.
Enhanced focus on strategic business objectives.
